text:
PAVAN G BELGAUMKAR
Mobile: +919916445169                                                  Email: pavan.belgaumkar@gmail.com

Looking for challenging assignment in Software Development/support environment with a leading organization where I can apply and build my technical & analytical skills

Summary

Focused, results-oriented and passionate Software engineer with 5+ years of professional experience in Informatica Power center, Informatica cloud, MSSQL, Pl/Sql, IBM DB2, UNIX

· Sound knowledge of informatica, Informatica cloud , SQL, Pl/Sql, Accent(VMS), UNIX
· Coordinate with Onsite team and Business user to ensure smooth delivery of services and applications.
· Worked on Project deliverables, Applications development and Production Support, L3 Problem Management and Enhancement Projects.
· Highly motivated, energetic, hardworking and self-driven professional with good analytical, organizational, creative and communication skills.

Education

· B.E. (Electronics & Communication Engineering in DSI College) from Visvesvaraya Technological University, in 2012. Secured 62.2% with First Class.
· Diploma(Electronics & Communication Engineering) from KHK Institute Dharwadin 2009.Secured 71.2% with First Class
· Pavan English Medium High School Dharwad in 2006. Secured 90.08 in SSLC


Technical Skills

Domain		: Microsoft, Database
Tools/Application	: CA Workload Automation, Informatica cloud, Informatica Power center. Oracle     pl/Sql, Microsoft SQL, Control-M, IBM DB2, Unix
			

Work Experience

· June 2017 to till date with Infosys Ltd as Technology Analyst
Project 1:
· Title			: Medtronic.
· Client			: Medtronic
· Tools/Applications	: Informatica, Informatica cloud, MS SQL, Oracle Pl/Sql, IBM DB2, WinSCP
· Role			: Developer


Details:
Medtronic plc is a medical device company. Its headquarters are in Dublin, Ireland. Its operational headquarters are in Fridley, Minnesota. Medtronic is among the world's largest medical equipment development companies

Responsibilities 


· Involved in resolving all the issue related to Medtronic
· Created various Informatica Mappings, Sessions and Workflows.
· Created various Informatica cloud Mappings, Configuration Tasks, Task flows, Schedulers, Connections, Data synchronization task.
· Involved in fixing the issue with Mappings.
· Responsible for Design and implementation of different Jobs which run in Informatica cloud.
· Performed query level tuning by creating indexes & modifying SQL queries. 
· Involved in Incident Management, Change Management and Problem Management.                           
· Involved in effort estimates for various projects/enhancements with accuracy. 
· Conducted Team meetings to maintain and enhance the ways of working. 
· Created SQL objects namely Tables, Views, Indexes, Procedures etc.
· Performed accurate Unit Testing and System Testing.
· Documented all the processes complying Industry standards.
· Involved in compatibility testing and estimated the scope of changes with accuracy.
· Performance tuning in Informatica.


· Dec 2013 to June 2017 with HCL Technologies Ltd as Software Engineer
Project 1:
· Title		:VS10-Megadata.
· Client		: Allianz
· Language	: Informatica PC, CA Workload Automation, SQL, Pl/Sql, 
· Role		: Software Engineer


Details:
Allianz is a European financial services company. Its core businesses are insurance and asset management. As of 2014, it is the world's largest insurance company. 
HCL Tech Manages ALLIANZ US with Day to Day activities.

Responsibilities 

· Responsible for Daily Cycle which runs in CA Workload Automation Tool, 
· Daily cycle also involves activities in Informatica, PL/Sql, Sql, .Net and VB 6. Daily cycle also has lot of criticality as the data we provide will directly go to US trade market NYSE.
· Involved in resolving all the issue related to Megadata.
· Involved in Development and Enhancement of Megadata
· Responsible for Design and implementation of different Jobs which run in CA Workload.
· Performed query level tuning by creating indexes & modifying SQL queries. 
· Involved in Incident Management, Change Management and Problem Management.                           
· Involved in effort estimates for various projects/enhancements with accuracy. 
· Interacted with clients to understand their requirements.

Project 2:
· Title		: IRT (Intermediate Reconciliation Tool)
· Client		: Deutsche Bank
· Language		: Informatica PC, Pl/Sql, Control-Toad, Unix
· Role		: Software Engineer


Deutsche Bank AG is a German global banking and financial services company with its headquarters in the Deutsche Bank Twin Towers in Frankfurt and has a large presence in Europe, the Americas, Asia-Pacific and the emerging markets. In 2009, Deutsche Bank was the largest foreign exchange dealer in the world with a market share of 21 percent. The company was a component of the STOXX Europe 50 stock market index until being delisted on August 8, 2016


Responsibilities 

· Performed query level tuning by creating indexes & modifying SQL queries. 
· Building mappings using Flat Files and CSV files.
· Matching incoming reports to generate Reconciliation report.
· Created SQL objects namely Tables, Views, Indexes, Procedures etc.
· Performed accurate Unit Testing and System Testing.
· Documented all the processes complying Industry standards.
· Created various Informatica Mappings, Sessions and Workflows.
· Involved in fixing the issue with Mappings.
· Creation of SDLC life cycle.
· Created various Change requests.
· Interacted with L2/L3 teams and understood the requirements for Development.


Strengths

· Quick learner and good listener.
· Self-driven and Self-motivated.
· Responsible and Hardworking.

Personal details

Permanent Address	:  F.No.7, Suvidha Apartments, Kabbur Road, Malmaddi, Dharwad-580007.
Date of Birth		:  27 Feb 1990
Marital Status		:  Single
Languages Known	:  English(Read/Write), Kannada(Read/Write), Hindi(Read/Write),    Telugu(Understand), Tamil(Understand).
